title: Top Places to visit in Rajouri, Jammu and Kashmir
content: Rajouri or Rajauri is a Town in Rajouri district in the state of Jammu and Kashmir, India. Rajouri is about 155 kilometres (96 mi) from Srinagar and 150 km from Jammu city on the Poonch Highway. Baba Ghulam Shah Badshah University is based in the town.
